effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder would take [super-effective]{mechanic:super-effective} []{type:dragon}-type damage, it consumes this item to halve the amount of damage taken.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed when struck by a super-effective Dragon-type attack to halve the damage.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ポケモンに　持たせると
効果バツグンの　ドラゴン技を
受けたとき　威力が　弱まる。

If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will
lessen the damage taken from one
supereffective Dragon-type attack.

Se un Pokémon ha questa bacca, l’attacco
superefficace di tipo Drago del nemico
viene indebolito.

Restaura cualquier característica reducida en
combate. Solo se puede usar una vez. Debe
llevarla un Pokémon.

Als getragenes Item schwächt diese Beere
sehr effektive Attacken des Angreifers
vom Typ Drache.

Tenue, cette Baie affaiblit une attaque ennemie
super efficace de type Dragon.

포켓몬에게 지니게 하면
효과가 뛰어난 드래곤 기술을
당했을 때 위력이 약해진다.

ポケモンに　もたせると
こうかばつぐんの　ドラゴン　わざを
うけたとき　いりょくが　よわまる。

Weakens a supereffective Dragon-type
attack against the holding Pokémon.

Weakens a supereffective Dragon-type
attack against the holding Pokémon.

Tenue, cette Baie affaiblit une attaque
ennemie super efficace de type Dragon.

If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s
supereffective Dragon-type attack.

A Poffin ingredient. If held by a
Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s
supereffective Dragon-type attack.

A Poffin ingredient. If held by a
Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s
supereffective Dragon-type attack.
